remarks: A function is continuous if it's domain is the union of sets over which the function is continuous.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
cncfuni.acn $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
cncfuni.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
cncfuni.auni $e |- ( ph -> A C_ U. B ) $.
cncfuni.opn $e |- ( ( ph /\ b e. B ) -> ( A i^i b ) e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t A ) ) $.
cncfuni.fcn $e |- ( ( ph /\ b e. B ) -> ( F |` b ) e. ( ( A i^i b ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
cncfuni $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d A b $.
$d B b $.
$d F b $.
$d b ph $.
